actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize establishment of the Gutzon Borglum National Historic Site, S. Dak.
short_title: Gutzon Borglum National Historic Site Act

summary.text: Gutzon Borglum National Historic Site Act - Establishes the Gutzon Borglum National Historic Site, South Dakota. Establishes the Gutzon Borglum Memorial Committee to advise and consult with the State of South Dakota on general policies and specific matters related to the administration of the historic site.

titles.title: Gutzon Borglum National Historic Site Act
A bill to authorize establishment of the Gutzon Borglum National Historic Site, S. Dak.
